channel.title: 3 proble' mos
channel.description:
:D PROBLEM :D
Problem1: I get this error every time I open my runserver, I know how to find it and everything but I just dunno how to fix it? Heres the Error:
client.java:16923: code to large public void parseIncomingPackets(){ ^
How do I fix it? It doesn't wreck anything on my server, I can still play fine, but yeah.. lol
Problem2: Ah might sound a bit no0bish but, how do I make it so that normal players can access their bank from anywhere {::bank}?
Problem3: Yeah um, everytime like 7 peaople come on my server it laggs immensly, And it also gets to about a max of 10 players then no more? I'm guessing its something to do with my computer/connection but I was just wondering if it wasn't and if I could fix it.
Sweet as Peace Hmpph

item.title: 3 proble' mos
item.dc:creator: @money67 money67
item.description:
@money67 wrote:

There is a tutorial on fixing the parseincommingpackets (tut section)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 05:38:53 PM[/size][hr]Search in your client.java for this "bank"
bank command with this (if your not using project16) if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")){ openUpBank(); }[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 05:40:44 PM[/size][hr]You might have to set a max player count in your player.java

Read full topic

item.title: 3 proble' mos

item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

     :D PROBLEM :D

Problem1: I get this error every time I open my runserver,
I know how to find it and everything but I just dunno how to fix it?
Heres the Error:

client.java:16923: code to large
public void parseIncomingPackets(){
^

How do I fix it? It doesn’t wreck anything on my server, I can still play fine, but yeah… lol

Problem2: Ah might sound a bit no0bish but, how do I make it so that normal players can access their bank from anywhere {::bank}?

Problem3: Yeah um, everytime like 7 peaople come on my server it laggs immensly,
And it also gets to about a max of 10 players then no more?
I’m guessing its something to do with my computer/connection but I was just wondering if it wasn’t and if I could fix it.

Peace
